definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: This also indicates some damping nature of caster angle with respect to yaw rate overshoot.
sentences.chinese: 同时说明主销后倾角对横摆角速度超调量有阻尼作用。

sentences.english: Envision the conductor as an assemblage of driven, damped oscillators .
sentences.chinese: 把导体看成是大量受迫阻尼振动的振子的集合。

sentences.english: The mechanism of noise damping by interlayered alloy was discussed on emphasis.
sentences.chinese: 并着重阐述了阻尼合金夹层的消音机理，试验证明。

sentences.english: It makes a new chance for the inter-area damping control of the system.
sentences.chinese: 这就为电力系统的区间阻尼控制提供了新的契机。

sentences.english: The dynamic problem of constrained layer damping(CLD) plate was investigated with the transfer function method in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 采用传递函数方法对约束层阻尼板进行了动力学分析。

sentences.english: They come from silicone tube which act as tester damper here.
sentences.chinese: 他们来自硅胶管，其中作为测试阻尼器在这里。

sentences.english: Each damper as leaving factory needs undergoing the following tests.
sentences.chinese: 每台阻尼器出厂时须进行下述试验。

sentences.english: The restraint of these sensitive modes calls for the increase of the damping of circular saw plate structure.
sentences.chinese: 欲抑制众多的敏感模态应设法增加圆锯片的结构阻尼。

sentences.english: The harmonic response of linear elastic structures with damping was analyzed using a reduced-basis method (RBM).
sentences.chinese: 通过减基法研究了有阻尼线弹性结构的谐响应。

sentences.english: Its damping effects is compared with shearing damper with high-damping rubber.
sentences.chinese: 最后将其与高阻尼剪切型拉索减振器进行了比较。

sentences.english: Upon on the basis, the free interface CMS theory was developed for hysteretic damping structure.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，发展了滞后阻尼结构的模态综合理论。

sentences.english: The influence of variation of stiffness and damping on vehicle ride performance is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了刚度和阻尼的变化对车辆平顺性的影响。

sentences.english: The uniform damping control of low-frequency oscillation(LFO) is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了电力系统低频振荡的均匀阻尼控制方法。

sentences.english: A fuzzy damping controller is designed to damp inter-area power oscillation.
sentences.chinese: 模糊阻尼控制器的设计，在潮湿的区域间功率振荡。

sentences.english: The modeling and identification of anisotropic damping property of Ni based single crystal alloys are presented.
sentences.chinese: 研究耐高温镍基合金各向异性阻尼特性的建模与识别。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
(of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape/(fig.) to rebound/to bounce back
